lender.name: Ellen
lender.occupational_info: I'm the CEO of Bulbby, an online webshop that sells personalized gifts for baby's and children.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I have a small home business too. I want to help other women become self-sufficient.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Heading out of high school i had no idea what to do with myself. I knew that i had a lot of opportunities that many do not have but i didnt feel motivated to do anything with myself. I booked a flight to Tanzania for six months on a whim after sending a few e-mails back and forth with a local school in Arusha. A month later i was living in with the kids and the difference in lifestyle blew my mind. There is no way to express how much that trip changed my views. Im still the same ole gal but i appreciate things just a whole lot more. Hot running water is such a blessing, just like an education, and i plan on taking advantage of university and learning and soaking up the education that a lot of people never can.

lender.name: Jen & Patrick
lender.loan_because: we are blessed and want others to have what we have!

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It's fun, and hopefully useful. Kiva is a good example of making connections via the web that would be hard to arrange without it.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the computer network at a small college.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others who, by circumstance, do not have the same good fortune and opportunities we have here in Australia.
lender.occupational_info: I have an online shop, selling natural products and safe water bottles online. I also build websites for other businesses to help them grow their business and make money.

lender.name: Matt & Meg
lender.loan_because: Matt and Meg loan because we are blessed and have the opportunity to share this with others. It is our prayer that our small contributions to our Kiva partners will be in turn a blessing.
lender.occupational_info: Matt is a secondary school English teacher & Meg is a human rights lawyer

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I resolve financial disputes and help people start and grow companies.

lender.name: Jakob
lender.loan_because: it makes sense

lender.name: Kait
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people pull themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Ana & Kearn
lender.loan_because: We understand the desire to start something Great from just a sparkle of an idea and the human need to learn and grow. We loan because we want the world to continue to Learn and Grow into someone they can be proud of.
lender.occupational_info: We help people learn to use money wiser.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: I believe in the free spirit and free entrepreneurship of people all around the world. Small businesses driven by motivated entrepreneurs that enable sustainable and green business models are critical to the well being of our world in general and the people of our world specifically.
lender.occupational_info: Leading a Finance team of experts in our company that design, develop, build and implement finance work process and IT application solutions for our new system landscape.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: All people need health, shelter and opportunity to earn a living. A tiny boost makes a huge difference for honest, hard-working people, and I have been blessed to be able to help provide that tiny boost.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes, and help them make good decisions about their homes.

lender.name: Garry
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Successful people deserve to be invested in
lender.occupational_info: Trying to find my place in the world

lender.name: Flood Famlly
lender.loan_because: We consider ourselves to be very fortunate and would like to assist people who are less so.
lender.occupational_info: 4 generations of our family contribute to Kiva each year at Christmas rather than giving gifts.

lender.name: Becca
lender.occupational_info: I work for a brewery analysing beer sales and trends in the beer and wider drinks market.

lender.name: perrault
lender.loan_because: aider ceux qui n'ont pas eu la chance de naitre sous une bonne etoile

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I believe work builds the soul. Because others gave me a chance, and I want to pass this on.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: it's a hand up, not a hand out.

lender.name: graham
lender.loan_because: I get great satisfaction from seeing people build a business successfully for the benefit of themselves and their community

lender.name: Victor
lender.whereabouts: Buenos Aires Ciudad de Buenos Aires

lender.name: Sindhu Wira
lender.loan_because: I know I'm filled to be emptied again I believe that the seed I have received I will sow

lender.name: Johanna
lender.loan_because: There are people in the world who need this little amount of money more than I do...
lender.occupational_info: IT Planner

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower people to help themselves and create value for others.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: I think it is our duty as citizens to help in whatever way we can. I believe success has a domino effect.
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of advancement at a university and assist donors in planning gifts in support of students.

lender.name: Hetty
lender.loan_because: I think it is a personal duty to share, and find this a wonderful way of contributing.
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate international (European) research cooperation (am not a researcher myself).

lender.name: MAKERI
lender.loan_because: i run NGO IN Nigeria, with women on skill empowerment in there communities, The load will help them to start there businesses within there communities.
lender.occupational_info: youth empowerment on skills development

lender.name: Bas
lender.loan_because: I believe in concept that we need to create opportunities for people to better their own situation.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a major software company which has the mission to help people realize their full potential. I like to extend this mission also by personal actions I manage for this company a product group in the Netherlands.

lender.name: Manu
lender.loan_because: It's only fair

lender.name: jerry & d.j. mccain
lender.loan_because: i fell it is the right thing to do and $25 for us is not that much money, but for others it can be a life changing for them.
lender.occupational_info: very challenging and exciting.

lender.name: Abra
lender.loan_because: I am in a position to do so.

lender.name: Edita
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together

lender.name: Nuno
lender.loan_because: If everyone helps a little, although we cannot make things perfect, we can make the better for someone.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because:
I lend because I know that, if given some support (of the kind we take for granted in the US), most people will be able to build their communities into rich, thriving places.
I especially like to loan to farming projects, because much of the wealth of the United States comes from artificially lowering the price of grain (through government subsidies) and then dumping the excess product on developing countries. Farmers in the developing country can't compete with the artificially low prices of the corn, soy, and wheat we export-- and so they can't make a living. We put them out of work, and continue a cycle of poverty that seems to justify us sending more cheap grain into that economy. And everyone wonders why Afghanis grow opium instead of grain.
So, farmers in other parts of the world deserve whatever edge we can give them-- including low-cost loans.
lender.occupational_info: I work with refugee resettlement organizations. My project is to help them use urban gardening & community gardening as a way to help refugee communities engage in their new city and feel comfortable and happy. Access to a green, outdoor gathering space and a spot to grow some vegetables and flowers with other people from your home country can make people feel a lot better in their transition, and make them feel like they own a little bit of their new country.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: Someone once helped me.

lender.name: Riitta
lender.loan_because: I am delighted if I can empower people to be entrepreneurs; to do what they wish to do and have passion for. I do believe that this is an excellent way of supporting.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur and mother of two teens. Been working within Information Technology sector, especially with Software & Services, for 25 years.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in the developing world to support themselves in a way they find successful.
lender.occupational_info: I work to protect natural areas and the plants and animals that live in those areas.

lender.name: Nam Hee
lender.loan_because: to share
lender.occupational_info: I'm a financial reporter

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who can help themselves with a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I am an administrator for a large housing association in Northern Ireland.

lender.name: Merle
lender.loan_because: You can teach a man to fish but he also needs a fishing pole.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I want to assist someone in making a living and supporting their family.
lender.occupational_info: I sell homes

lender.name: LaTrelle
lender.occupational_info: history teacher

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I work in the finance industry and think that Kiva is a wonderful innovation. Giving a helping hand to entrepreneurs will empower developing nations across the world to create a culture which will improve quality of life substantially.

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: I hope that it will help change lives.

lender.name: Fredrik
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Internet marketing consultant.

lender.name: HELEN
lender.loan_because: I can. I know that my life is blessed and I wnat to share my good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a private college.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: We all have a role to play in making the world a better place to live.

lender.name: Doris
lender.loan_because: I love this idea, paying it forward!

lender.name: Joni
lender.loan_because: I loan in my grandmother's memory. She was a wonderful person who showed people the love of Christ through compassion and generosity.

lender.name: Linda Denis
lender.loan_because: I gave $500 to my team at Blitz Direct to lend for Xmas in 2009

lender.name: Michelle/Team Logan Kunz
lender.loan_because: my wonderful nephew, Logan, who died on May 15, 2010, was passionate about Kiva. And so his dream lives on.

lender.name: Shana
lender.loan_because: The idea of being able to take the cost of a decent dinner and help someone and then later take that same money to help another blows my mind.
lender.occupational_info: I monitor a bank's money.

lender.name: Ilana
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance can make a difference. If I can help hard working people gain access to funds to help provide local services and products, I feel I have put my money to good use.
lender.occupational_info: I run my own small business in the United States.

lender.name: Echo
lender.loan_because: They're people in the world who would die to have my life. Using my KIva loans to someone who needs help with payments or upkeep, it makes me proud to help out others who dont have what they need.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and think that everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: rick
lender.loan_because: Sometimes all people need is help with the first step in their journey.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Christ would.

lender.name: ALICE
lender.loan_because: I believe in small businesses they are the ones who support the world. As a small business owner myself I know the struggles of single women to keep their families together.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving to those that help themselves and to share.

lender.name: Dore'
lender.loan_because: I feel the need to share with others because others have helped me along the way.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: I live in a wonderful free country. I have so much and others have so little.

lender.name: PetriK
lender.loan_because: Been there, done that, seen it. Now lets share with others, I believe that even little things counts !
lender.occupational_info: International business development is my profession and speed is the passion...

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: My small loan can go a long way to make someone else's life better.
lender.occupational_info: I help make new technology adoption smooth for my firm.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: God has given me more than I need. He has made it possible for me to give and to share.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor and I share God's love with everyone I can.

lender.name: Chris&Steph
lender.loan_because: We have been very fortunate in our lives and we want to share that with others who have not had the same fortune
lender.occupational_info: One of us works with airplanes and one of us goes to school and rents property.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: Gold Level promotional product distributor helping companies achieve marketing objectives of any scope. Full-service experts deliver creative and unique promotional marketing ideas and tools to get you remembered while matching your needs and budget.
lender.occupational_info: Gold Level promotional product distributor helping companies achieve marketing objectives of any scope. Full-service experts deliver creative and unique promotional marketing ideas and tools to get you remembered while matching your needs and budget.

lender.name: Shiah
lender.loan_because: I care about people.

lender.name: Helen Boyer
lender.loan_because: it's a humble way to help another person help the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people in non-English speaking countries learn how to speak English.

lender.name: Sheri-Lynn
lender.loan_because: Love thy neighbour as you would Love yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I think, I write, I talk, I type and I try to remind people who have forgotten how to smile, that it is a priceless gift that can be exchanged anywhere, anytime and across many Nations.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I've been very fortunate and would like to help other realize their potential.
lender.occupational_info: I lead a team of people who sell fitness equipment over the Internet.

lender.name: Quincey and John
lender.occupational_info: Quincey: I have a degree in forestry and I work toward sustainable land management. John: I am a fire fighter for the US Forest Service

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I want to help emerging economies.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage financial independence. To give those who want a better life the opportunity to move forward.
lender.occupational_info: I stay home and take care of my home and family. I also give much of my time to volunteer organizations and my church.

lender.name: Richard and Shela
lender.loan_because: "Paying forward" helps many; it is time to give back.
lender.occupational_info: retired and enjoying travel and grandkids!

lender.name: Sue and Ron
lender.occupation: Cabin builders and humming bird watchers.

lender.name: Dina
lender.loan_because: I learned about Kiva in the book I am reading, Half the Sky.

lender.name: Roberto
lender.loan_because: I'm keenly interested in international development and I support entrepreneurs and others working in such areas as housing, food security, and education.
lender.occupational_info: I practice general U.S. corporate law in Milan. It involves preparing, reviewing and revising a lot of documents.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good that these microloans are helping small business owners grow through their own initiative and efforts.
lender.occupational_info: For 35 years I worked for my Federal government as a human resources manager in hiring, promoting, and developing employees to make the government work well in serving the people both within the US and world.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to give back and to help make our world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Reiki practitioner and teacher.

lender.name: Michelle & Chris
lender.loan_because: We are Christians - God has blessed us and we want to bless others
lender.occupational_info: We are Property Managers

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because:
As a man of middle class background I have found that the poor have taught me more important and invaluable life lessons than my privileged American upbringing has ever taught me. Ironically, I find myself impoverished and the poor rich in spirit.
I have been wrecked by grace. I honestly believe that Christ is the hope of this world, and I will make my heart pliable and soft so that I will hear the cry of the weak and the needy.

lender.name: Verlee & Steve
lender.loan_because: It's a gift that can keep on giving.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.occupational_info: Front line support worker, working with women and their children in crisis and everyday needs.
